#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

#define MAX 2011

/*
int gcd(int n1,int n2)
{
	if(n2==0)
		return n1;
	else
		return (gcd(n2,n1%n2));
}
*/

int main()
{
	int t;

	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		int a,b,c,d;

		cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;

		int n1=a*b;
		int n2=c*d;

		if(n1%n2==0)
			cout<<"yes\n";
		else
			cout<<"no\n";
	}

	return 0;
}
